name: Dragunity Lord - Georgius
text:
2+ monsters, including a Tuner
Your opponent cannot activate the effects of monsters in the GY while this card is equipped with a "Dragunity" card. You can only use each of the following effects of "Dragunity Lord - Georgius" once per turn. If this card is Link Summoned, or your opponent Special Summons a monster(s): You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher "Dragunity" monster from your Extra Deck or GY. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Equip Card you control to the GY; negate that effect.
